name: Fall of Saturday
description: YEAR 2031—SUSPICIOUS ACTIVITIES OCCURRED DURING LAST FEW MONTHS NEAR A BUILDING SITE LOCATED IN ISRAELI BORDERS. RESCUE TEAMS HAVE FOUND SEVERAL ROTTEN CORPSES IN THE AREA. BUREAU OF IDENIFIATION IS REPORTEDLY UNABLE TO IDENTIFY THE DEAD BODIES. GLOBAL ORGANIZATIONS HAVE ASKED FOR IRAN'S AID IN GETTING TO THE ROOTS OF THIS REGIONAL UNSETTLEMENT. ONE IRANIAN COMMANDO IS DEPLOYED TO THE REGION FOR INVESTIGATING THE SITUATION.
